## Description {#details}

Represents the location at which a variable is stored.

Definition at line 31 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/debughandlerbase-h">DebugHandlerBase.h</a>.

### LoadChain {#ac5286bc94ab9e13df3361f00a6550c7d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;int64&#95;t, 1&gt; llvm::DbgVariableLocation::LoadChain</>}>
Chain of offsetted loads necessary to load the value if it lives in memory.

Every load except for the last is pointer-sized.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/debughandlerbase-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/debughandlerbase-h">DebugHandlerBase.h</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### extractFromMachineInstruction() {#aba45f582b07732ab64d6d518d4b45b12}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; DbgVariableLocation &gt; DbgVariableLocation::extractFromMachineInstruction (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; Instruction)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Extract a VariableLocation from a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a>.

This will only work if <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> is a debug value instruction and the associated <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diexpression">DIExpression</a> is in one of the supported forms. If these requirements are not met, the returned Optional will not have a value.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/debughandlerbase-h/#l00048">48</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/debughandlerbase-h">DebugHandlerBase.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debughandlerbase-cpp/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debughandlerbase-cpp">DebugHandlerBase.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
